title: Smyrna Font
content:
Can anyone suggest some complimentary face that would work well with this font?

[http://www.myfonts.com/search/smyrna/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417082953/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/smyrna/fonts/ "http://www.myfonts.com/search/smyrna/fonts/")

Thank you for your time!
author: zollicreative

comments.content: I meant fonts that will work with the Smyrna font...thank you!
Of mine, [Paradigm Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417082953/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/paradigm-pro/pro-light/) is probably most suitable for body.

Nick's suggestion is a good one!  
Are you looking for a sarif? I would try Arno Pro.
Thanks! Any suggestions for a sans?
